name: GENIUS Venture Capital
overview: Target small and medium-sized, technology-oriented companies in the country Mecklenburg-Vorpommern in the procurement and provision of equity to assist with the was, May 1998 by the Technology and Commercial Centre e. V. Schwerin / Wismar GENIUS Venture Capital GmbH was founded in. Venture capital is capital that takes risks in your company. There is risk capital. Purpose of risk capital is the perception of opportunities. It is made available to you when the odds exceed the risks. Venture Capital is liable capital, which will be submitted by an investor. The provision of venture capital is not unlike the mortgage loans made by the presence of viable collateral-dependent, but from the estimated earnings potential of your project and in particular extent of your personal and business skills.
